website_summaries.verdict: Snug fit and conductive yarn coupled with silicone gel grips make these gloves comfortable to wear and text with.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for touchscreen fingers that work well on many devices, and the silicone grips that help wearers keep a firm grasp on their devices
cons: Some people feel the gloves aren't warm enough for extremely cold temperatures
Some reports of touchscreens not working while wearing them

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! Im typing this with the gloves on. The only catch is i have really stupidly tiny hands and the finger tips can be just a tad long so i have to pull them down. These are not water proof, they are cloth and would retain water. Ive only worn them from the apartment office back to my house as of right now but they were nice and cozy. I will update if my opinion changes but as of right now i quite enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Multiple screens did not react to touchscreen gel
customer_reviews.text: I could not play with my phone (Samsung), my son's phone (iPhone), or my iPad while wearing these gloves. The touchscreen gel did nothing more than offer a little grip while driving. There are probably better gloves for that purpose though. They are soft gloves though. Stretchy and soft inside. If I wasn't interested in the touchscreen aspect, I'd have considered these nice MILD winter or fall gloves. I would pick something else for cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: L. Addi

customer_reviews.title: Good for California weather
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of gloves that I could use with my phone and decided to give these a try. I ordered in medium and they are good except a little too short for my ring and pinky fingers. The touchscreen worked great at first but my index finger has been working with less frequency as of late. There is also some fraying happening on the fingers with long stretches of loose threads forming. Good for a cheap option but if you’re concerned about quality you may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M

customer_reviews.title: Lousy on touch screen, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: They are okay as far as warm goes. A little snug. But they are awful when it comes to touch screens, both android phone and iPad. Buy a different pair of gloves if that’s what you need them for. And while the return item button is active, it says I can’t return them. Again, don’t buy unless you want to be tap tap tapping away with nothing happening but intermittent movement.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Let's Give 'em A Hand!
customer_reviews.text: When buying winter gloves, there are three criteria to look for; warmth, comfort, and the ability to use a touch screen. Choose two. These gloves aren't much warmer than your bare hands, but they work well with a touchscreen and what warmth they DO offer is comforting, like the thought of Jeff Bezos, powerless to stop the effects of time on his aging, deteriorating body.
customer_reviews.author: BetterThanJesus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, no slip grip
customer_reviews.text: I like these gloves and I'm impressed by the pattern of gripping material they used on the palms and fingers. These are the first knitted gloves I've ever had that I can really say I am happy with. They grip the steering wheel - very important if you don't want to get into an accident - you can use with a cell phone and not have to take the gloves off - and they are warmer than other knitted gloves I've purchased previously. I think the knit is a bit thicker and more well-made. But the grip! I'm keeping these in my car. They are DEFINITELY the gloves I'm going to for driving in cold weather now!
customer_reviews.author: C. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are amazing. I moved from California to Connecticut and needed some good gloves to keep my hands warm so I can still use my phone when it get to ridiculous temperatures like 18 degrees or below outside. Rain, snow, sleet these gloves are solid. They’re super warm and super comfy and the grip is excellent for gripping rails while using the stairs in the snow. The touch screen is also incredibly accurate and responsive. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Jordan

customer_reviews.title: poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: these gloves don't work well. they should not be called winner gloves but spring /fall gloves. very thin. touchscreen fingertips don't work. can't return them so I'm stuck with regular cheap gloves that I can't use for winter time. false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: AT C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to it's claims. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Hands got cold within a few minutes. It claims to be able to use "touch screen" while wearing them. I had to remove my glove to use the touch screen. If I could have rated that part 0, I would have. I got a little snow on my glove and it made my fingers wet almost immediately. They are, however, very comfortable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bell

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are good for me
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the gloves are perfect for me, and I'll explain why for me. I don't have large hands and they fit just right they are tight and soft in the inside, not insanely soft but soft enough they are good for the cold but in short intervals, like if you are walking around and like your gloves snug and be able to touch your phone, it works great the are not invasive and they fit on your side jacket bags with no issue they are economic $ enough and do the job right they are not for long extreme cold periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Went to Boston last February with this. After only a few minutes, I felt like I wasn't wearing any gloves and it didn't even snow. DIDN'T KEEP MY HANDS WARM AT ALL. Didn't do any good at all. I want to return it but I've used it for a week straight (because I've got no choice). Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for myself initially. I figured for the price they would at least keep my hands warm in the car while driving. I immediately tried them on when I got them and knew I got a GREAT deal! These gloves are super warm. Almost a fleece lined glove, great grippe palm side and I don't have to take them off to do touch screen things. Well worth the money! I ended up returning to the posting and buying two more pairs for my husband and mother.
customer_reviews.author: Chantalle M

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but falls apart
customer_reviews.text: After a month some of the fingertip covers started developing progressively bigger holes. It got to the point where the tip of my thumb is just fully exposed while wearing these lol. Didn't get the wrong size either, and clipped my nails. I think it's just inconsistent threading near the top. Also, the touchscreen sensitivity wears off pretty quickly, even if you only wear these while using your phone or opening doors. Works great at first though.
customer_reviews.author: brendon prophette

customer_reviews.title: Good Casual Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are nice and are what you expect in terms of comfort and touchscreen usability. I have yet to have a problem with using my phone with these gloves on. The only gripe I have with these gloves is the feeling of when they get wet after a few hours of shoveling. Overall these are great to have on for casual wear but not so much if you're outside in the snow for work.
customer_reviews.author: Figofami

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit nicely. The rubber grip is a nice feature when pushing my daughter's stroller or driving in the car normal gloves slip due to no traction. It is an added feature that I didn't realize how valuable it would be. I love that they are touch screen capable and water resistance. I'd highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Fit me well as a woman with long fingers. I find most women's gloves a weird fit (I wonder where this woman with a long palm and two inch stubby fingers is that so many gloves seem designed for.) Comfortable and the grip dots mean the steering wheel doesn't slip. It is hit or miss as to whether the phone can react to the finger tip, but honestly that is true of most gloves that claim to work with touch screens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dollar Store Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are merely the 99c ones with a little line across the finger. You can't just touch screen, you have to practically put your finger through your phone in order to get it to work. This was the worst purchase I ever made. If I would have purchased from the dollar store, I might have a better use for them. These are trash. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: KatrinaM

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought those gloves as a gift for my son who will be traveling to study in Russia. I live in Guatemala, in Central America, and we don't have such cold weathers here unless the times when one climbs volcanos which he already did and felt great!! they are very light and comfortable; for our 'cold weather' in mountains and volcanoes, they worked very well... for the very-cold weather of Russia, I hope they will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rommy Ramírez

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves, just what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying box store gloves to use with my camera in cold weather, but they didn't have the touch screen ability, or were too bulky. These seem to solve those problems very well. They shouldn't be considered to be as warm as thick winter gloves, but they are what you'd hope for and expect.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not top quality, but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. They work well with my phone (perfect for winter runs). The material is super soft. When they arrived they had some threads hanging off that I had to snip, and I can tell they might start working their way into holes. But I'll definitely just replace them with the same pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These are good gloves and will definitely keep you warm. Using a touchscreen is possible, though still a little difficult. I found myself having to tap and swipe multiple times for things to work. That's pretty much what I expected though. Would definitely buy for myself again or others!
customer_reviews.author: Baylee

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on First Day - Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: Within the first hour that I wore these gloves, the fingertips ripped open. This happened with almost zero activity. I tried to return them but unfortunately found out that there is a no return policy. Save your money and buy something else. These are terrible and the seller does not stand behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Warm but don’t work well with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are warm and do their job as far as gloves go but they do not work with my iPhone very well at all. I just got these a few days ago and have to take them off in order to use my phone, which stinks bc that’s the main reason I picked these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These gloves work great when typing on a keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The air circulation is always an issue at my work, so it's always on the cold side so I decided to give these gloves a try. I'm very impressed with them and am happy that I'm able to type on my keyboard while wearing these gloves. (they are also way more responsive when touching the screen on my phone then other gloves that claimed to work good) I've tried other gloves that are fingerless but my fingers would get way too cold since my hands and fingers weren't fully covered. These gloves keep my hands toasty while still being able to do my job, which is truely amazing! I would recommend these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very soft and warm. Since they are touch-screen compatible, I don’t have to take them off every time I answer my phone. A note about fit, I have small hands. I ordered medium size and they fit perfectly so I suggest that you order a larger size if you’re not sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Keep Hands Warm
customer_reviews.text: I tried to give these a fair shot. I have worn them at least 10 times outside for 30+ minutes at a time and they have never kept my hands warm. I’m really disappointed because they had great reviews. I hate them though. Super bummed
customer_reviews.author: Waldo47

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I wish they made these in a smaller size. I don't have big hands or big wide fingers so these are really comfortable warm gloves but too big and there is no small size, bummer.
customer_reviews.author: silvi

customer_reviews.title: great idea, fades over time
customer_reviews.text: out of the box, they worked amazingly well. i’ve had them for probably over a month now and the touch sensitivity has drastically decreased. i find i have to push harder or use a different finger to use my phone, and most of the time i get frustrated and just take the glove off to use my phone, which defeats the purpose. no, i haven’t washed them or even gotten them wet, which i would imagine could effect the touch sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought they were. Comfortable fit tho. The touch screen part is iffy hit and miss but the grip on the steering wheel is nice. Should make it without fingers be even better but nice gloves.
customer_reviews.author: MsTee

customer_reviews.title: !!DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER AT ALL. I wish I can give a negative rating. I don’t even know where to begin with this. One, the gloves came with multiple stitches sticking OUT (shown in pictures). Although they fit, the gloves are NOT protective against cold weather or wind. It feels as though I’m not wearing anything at all. The lining is NOT wool so it doesn’t do a well job of keeping my hands warm. The “touch screen tips” do NOT work at all. Everything I wanted in gloves, this pair of gloves doesn’t have it. What’s worse for not delivering what the company promised, I can’t even return them for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with touchscreen phone
customer_reviews.text: These advertised that they worked with touchscreen phones but my iPhone X does not detect touch at all when I am wearing them. It’s annoying because I just have to take them off if I want to use my phone. They do keep my hands warm and I like the way they look ya the price is right but def disappointed that I can’t use my phone with them which I something I specifically shopped for
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Average gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Received the item as described, the touch feature is not the responsive and not good for cold weather 50 degrees. There more of a tropical glove. Decent material for the price. This fits a low budget income. If you need snow gloves these will not be the ones. Try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: GUTZ

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: This gloves are very soft and warm they fit me perfect specially for this winter in NJ where is really freezing and they work perfect for touch screen in my iPhone and my car too I will really recommend this product that’s why I will give then 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Nilda

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Vacationed in freezing weather and these gloves fit the bill. They are comfortable and warm without being too bulky - and you can't beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MelBy

customer_reviews.title: Really cool gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't checked out whether these gloves are water resistant, but all things consi8dered, I love the fit, the feel and texture of these gloves. I even bought a pair for my girl who works security and needed the upgrade in here work clothing. I highly recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not for me....
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are really comfortable and are touchscreen friendly. The winter weather conditions where I live are very rough. These pair of gloves will not keep you warm if the temperatures go below 32F. Also if you clean the ice/snow wearing these, they get an ashy color at their tips even though you barely touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Warm, work well
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wears these when she’s horseback riding. Soft, warm and works pretty well with her iPhone screen. Arrived fast and so far, wash well.
customer_reviews.author: KindleAddict

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in its durability
customer_reviews.text: Fingertips ripped after 2 weeks of use. To be fair, I did use them as gloves for soccer to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The gloves keep your hands pretty warm. They are very comfortable. I used then while working in a refrigerated warehouse as liner gloves and they helped tremendously. I have yet to try alone in the winter yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Set
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these gloves for the past couple months to keep my hands warms during the morning hours when I am out. They have been great at keeping my hands warm, and still allow for the flexibility that I have been looking for. Compared to most other gloves these are a bit thinner so you wont get that same level of insulation as you would expect. However the trade off to actually being able to use these gloves in a working environment is the best for me. I would buy these again just to have a spare set if I ever lose the first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run big in size.
customer_reviews.text: I used the sizing chart and measured my hand. The gloves are slightly big. I ordered a medium and should have ordered a small. Otherwise Okay,
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT work with touch screens
customer_reviews.text: The gloves do not work with touch screens as advertised! Otherwise nice lite weight gloves
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste money
customer_reviews.text: The gloves don’t work with touch screen phones. Still have to remove the gloves to use my iPhone X. Not a good buy . My fingers are numb by removing several times to answer my phone. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bajan shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Comfortable and keeps my hands warm.
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely a five-star rating. I'm not sure if it is water resistant or not, but these gloves really keep my hands warm. I usually wear them while biking and instead of having to bike a short amount of time, I was able to bike comfortably for long periods of time since my hands weren't freezing. I was also able to use my phone with the gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for ice skating. Keeps hands warm and comfortable. My family friend loved them and said their well made. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FREESTYLE

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality not useful for touch screen
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen spots are not aligned with the finger tips to be useful at all. The gloves are not fully waterproof and are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good winter sport glove
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted some lightweight/touch gloves for playing tennis and pickle ball in the winter. They keep your hands warm but still give you the feel for the paddle or racquet. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my phone and feels nice.
customer_reviews.text: The product came very fast and works as describes. Honestly expected it to be less mitten like and more like a glove but I still like it a lot. Looks nicer in person then in the pictures. Feels comfortable on my hands and the touchscreen feature works fantastic. Not too sure about the water resistance capabilities though due to their mitten like feel but still pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: nickolas

customer_reviews.title: They Work great don't always go by reveiws.
customer_reviews.text: For people saying they don't work really? They work perfectly can access everything on my phone including clicking and swiping. Very satisfied I'm using and android but I'm sure they work with any phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Good  Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are really good gloves for the price. The only problem is the pinky is very long, maybe I should’ve gotten a small.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice, clean and is comfortable. The texture is pretty nice and does not scratch the skin or cause itch. Would recommend. It was shipped and delivered overnight for free.
customer_reviews.author: serhad ketsamanian

customer_reviews.title: Not warm at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves because they supposedly were warm. When I put them on, they were not warm. My hands were very cold even with them on.no
customer_reviews.author: Herman Lerner

customer_reviews.title: No impressed
customer_reviews.text: Got these gloves to take to NYC. My husband and I were not happy with it, because we could not use our phones with it. It is a false advertisement. The touch screen feature is hard to use. I ended up having to take the gloves off to take pictures of text or use maps. So, you get what you pay for :(
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Machado

customer_reviews.title: Not touch screen friendly at ALL
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these as I spend a decent amount of time outside and need access to my phone. The fit is just ok, I do have long fingers so I am used to having gloves fit a little short. The inside is very soft. When I went to use my phone, I could not press any buttons. I tried adjusting the gloves, still no luck. Do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves for a digital life style. Work great with cell phones and Tablets. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: not useful for phone use
customer_reviews.text: Personally I bought these to be able to use my phone while wearing the gloves - that did not work at all, maybe 5% of the time. The finger tip sections would not activate, only on some odd positions. I spent most of my time taking the gloves off to be able to use my phone. Regardless, they are still a functional set of gloves that can be used in cold weather so can't be mad at that
customer_reviews.author: Yousef Al-Rashed

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are a ‘great fit’ and a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are warm and comfortable! I am particularly happy with the full palm grips on them, making them good for driving. Having the ability to use touch screens (iPhone 7 is no issue) is great, especially on chilly days. The only drawback is that they are definitely not water resistant, so scraping snow from the car takes a little more forethought. But small habit changes will make these gloves a great replacement for my north face ones.
customer_reviews.author: DJMbalt2010

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. He says they kept his hands warm in Philadelphia during a Dec. rain!!! Dry too!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. spencer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Durability
customer_reviews.text: Though aesthetically pleasing and comfortable to wear, these gloves were not very adept at allowing my fingertip to "read" when pressed against even the largest of touchscreens and actually got progressively worse over the course of a single day. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. MaDD

customer_reviews.title: Used on a cool day no precipitation
customer_reviews.text: Only wore these once. Seems pretty comfortable but by being knitted, I wonder how they would hold up against wetness albeit rain or snow.... very form fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Miike

customer_reviews.title: Well made and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and thick knit gloves. Size runs normal and fit snugly and comfortably due to the stretch. Touch screen finger and thumb works well and is not visble. The silicone grip lines are perfectly spaced and work very well for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Fit is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Maybe because they’re unisex, they fit overly tight but the fingers were overly long.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were okay, but the touchscreen tips didn't work very well. It was also very cold (0 F) where I was and I needed really thick ski mittens/gloves. But these gloves would be okay in warmer temperatures (30-40 F).
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: They are So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use your gloves for your cell phone while driving when it is cold. No need to take them off! They work great. They are warm, comfortable and so reasonably priced. They come in 3 sizes and 11 colors, a color for everyone. These would make great Christmas or birthday gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sydow

customer_reviews.title: On the go gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves, snug, warm and can take some water. Perfect for running errands in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: TCR

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart easily at seems
customer_reviews.text: wore 5 times just for driving and between thumb and index finger the stitching came apart. Not worth $10.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Warm but touch screen gel is bad
customer_reviews.text: My hands are warm But my iPhone won't respond to touch What a bitter conundrum
customer_reviews.author: Derek Wang

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small hands
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen finger was hard to use since the glove was too big for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: pets4jc

customer_reviews.title: Cold hands no good
customer_reviews.text: Could have gotten better ones at Walmart, my fingertips bursts out of the top and it was cold hands from there.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work when you touch the screen
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed when I tried them on. The first thing I did was try to use my phone with them on and I touch the screen but they didn’t work. I text and the same happened... NOTHING. So I’m very disappointed because that was the main reason I bought them. If I could press no star I would have done that on the touch screen question. ZERO stars on that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and a convenience to be able to use tablets. The gloves deserves a 5 star if not because of the fuzzy heading after 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Levng

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a medium because it didn’t give the option of a small. Other than being a little big, they are comfortable and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: mami

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use touch screen at all
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use my iPhone whatsoever with the gloves. However, they are warm and soft. Haven’t tested “water resistant” yet but the snow is here and I shall see soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They don't work with my phone at all. They are just cheap, thin gloves. I'm writing this review with one of the gloves in my hand because I can't even slide my phone open with the glove on. They are basically just Dollar tree quality and don't have anything special about them
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good except for touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Does well the job except for the touch screen feature that barely works.
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: "Touch can improve "
customer_reviews.text: I do not regret buying this, HOWEVER the touch is not the best. But it's also not so bad. Please take this in consideration before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Zeek

customer_reviews.title: Riding side by side gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are soft, warm and very comfortable. Perfect for riding in the side by side
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and it’s comfortable. Touch is hit or miss with certain fingers. Probably just me. Hard to take our cards from wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Bearak

customer_reviews.title: Does not warm or work with touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. Pros- 1. Looks good 2. Comfortable to wear 3. Good grip Cons- 1. It does not work with touch screens. I had to press multiple times to get a keypress detected. 2. It does not warm at all. Even when its 50-55F, my hands feel cold wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Fit well.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing which I dislike about the gloves is the name printed on the top of the glove. I prefer that my gloves look more formal.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hix

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as warm as I thought they would be, but touch screen works.
customer_reviews.author: Bj4466

customer_reviews.title: better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: comfort + warm good enough for driving or just work as glove.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: Globes
customer_reviews.text: The information says that you can use your phone while wearing these gloves. So far, they haven’t worked for my phone. They have kept my hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these as a gift
customer_reviews.text: They are surprisingly comfortable I drove with them and they were easy
customer_reviews.author: NickyP

customer_reviews.title: Winter travel
customer_reviews.text: I have got them wet but work for the most better with my phone and watch but one or two don't all the time if the ones that suppose to. Othen then that great and warm
customer_reviews.author: lexus fisher

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Warm enough to be out in the current polar vortex of 2019 and my hands don't instantly freeze while texting. That's all I was looking for. If you want continuous and guaranteed warmth no matter the temperature, knit gloves will never be enough to provide that. But if you want gloves that are warm and feel secure while remaining thin enough to enable full use of your hands then these gloves work perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stepfan Thelemaque

customer_reviews.title: Keep hands warm
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are for general wear outside in the winter. Not for heavy duty use. They do keep hands warm though and I would recommend. They work ok with touch screens, but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lccoatsworth

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen capabilities are really bad.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are nice, but the touchscreen ability is almost non existing. It seems it has touchscreen capabilities on 3 fingers, but only the index "works" and forget about typing your password or zooming on a map. The rest is a OK winter glove, silicone is really nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Kozina

customer_reviews.title: Holes within Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've had these gloves for only one month and the index fingers are already showing signs of wear. I can completely put my index finger through the hole that has been created. The touch screen feature is absolute trash, it only works with one finger and it is impossible to unlock the screen using these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Lougiu

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't get again
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these are too long in the fingers and not warm enough 😣
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Gloves
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the gloves is that I can use it for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Medium for Cold and Basic Touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft. It does work for the cold but definitely not the best option for extreme cold. I bought it specifically for the touchscreen and I wasn't fully convinced. You won't see me texting as I normally do for sure, it doesn't work smoothly. I only use my index finger to do quick things.
customer_reviews.author: cm2356

customer_reviews.title: Very Cozy
customer_reviews.text: We had a very cold wave in my (normally hot) state around Christmas and all stores ran out of men gloves (no joke). So I ordered these which arrived in 2 days and were fantastic. Just as they looked, very warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: AZRavenOwl

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft, not touchscreen compatible at all!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are stylish comfortable and warm but don’t kid yourself there’s no way you can operate any kind of a touchscreen with these puppies on your head I still have to take them off Iphone, pad, my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: U can’t not use the phone it is not water resistant cheap stuff
customer_reviews.author: Tonito

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are not easy to use your phone with, you have to press really hard to get the screen to react at all. The rubber grips do just about nothing.
customer_reviews.author: reefswimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and warm
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well. They need a pointer tip on index finger or thumb to work better with phones.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good for cold weather, don't use for skiing or snowboarding
customer_reviews.author: jalisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, sleek, comfortable, and responsive to touchscreen.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are sleek and responsive. I didn’t have any problem with the touchscreen like I’ve had with similar products. The gloves did stay dry with causal use, but definitely not for building a snowman ⛄️
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t be able to keep my warm in snow they’re barely water proof. Their like cotton cloves, I was confused and unable to use them for the slopes
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

product_meta.title: TRENDOUX Winter Gloves for Men and Women - Upgraded Touch Screen Anti-Slip Silicone Gel - Elastic Cuff - Thermal Soft Wool Lining - Knit Stretchy Material
product_meta.description:

 * Customer Reviews:4.2 out of 5 stars6,972 ratings
feature_bullets: UPGRADED TOUCH SCREEN: 50% more conductive yarn added on touchscreen fingertips than others, you can better touch screen of your smartphone, iPad, tablet as well as your car while driving without taking your hands out in freezing weather.

☛HIGH SENSITIVE TOUCHSCREEN: Featuring high sensitive conductive material on thumbs, forefingers and middle fingers, you can wear the gloves to touch screen of your smartphone, tablet, iPhone or other touch screen devices

☛TRIANGLE SILICONE ANTI-SLIP: Fully covered with triangle silicone on palm, you can grip the steering wheel firmly when driving or hold your phone steadily without worrying about it slipping from your hand

☛WARM LINING AND COMFORTABLE: Made of soft napping wool the inner lining, the gloves are extremely comfortable and warm considering they aren’t bulky! Also with the stretchy snug fit, you can type a text just as fast as you would without gloves

☛WELL FITTING AND ELASTIC CUFF: Thickened elastic wrist keeps the glove closed around your skin and keeps the snow or wind out in winter. And the gloves are stretchy enough to fit your hands perfectly

☛GOOD GIFT FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS: These gloves are unisex and stretchy and have two sizes to choose, you can send one as a gift to your family or friends without worrying about the problem of size. They will love it very much
